titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the broken succession of the crown of England: inculcated, about the later end of the reign of Queen Elisabeth. Not impertinent for the better compleating of the general information intended.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the broken succession of the crown of England: inculcated, about the later end of the reign of Queen Elisabeth. Not impertinent for the better compleating of the general information intended.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: X3v refers to "This manuscript treatise .. coming from the hands of a popish priest, and comprehending the substance of what was written and published by Father Parson's the Jesuit, under the name of Doleman", i.e. Robert Parsons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
